Document :root { --gold100: #ffd700; } @-webkit-keyframes pulse { 0% { box-shadow: 0 0 4px var(--gold100), inset 0 0 4px var(--gold100); } 50% { box-shadow: 0 0 16px var(--gold100), inset 0 0 14px var(--gold100); } 100% { box-shadow: 0 0 4px var(--gold100), inset 0 0 4px var(--gold100); } } body { background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml;base64,"); background-size: contain; background-repeat: repeat-y; } html { background-color: #091644; } body { display: grid; align-items: center; justify-items: center; } #videoDisplay { max-width: 100%; /\* margin-bottom: 20px; \*/ } video { width: 100%; max-width: 900px; align-items: center; justify-content: center; margin-top: 0.5rem; } button { -webkit-background-clip: text; color: transparent; background-size: 100% 100%; opacity: 100%; background-image: linear-gradient( 160deg, #004e38, #027a58, #a2fee4, #027a58, #004e38 ); /\* background-image: linear-gradient( 160deg, #a54e07, #b47e11, #fef1a2, #bc881b, #a54e07 ); \*/ font-size: 5vw; font-weight: 600; padding: 0.5rem; border: 0; } buttonFrame { margin-top: 0.5rem; background: radial-gradient( ellipse at center, #0e2b89 0%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 1) 100% ); border-radius: 8px; box-shadow: 4px 4px 6px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.6); -webkit-animation: pulse 3.7s linear 0.3s infinite; } #audio-control { cursor: pointer; padding: 10px 20px; background: #000; color: #fff; border-radius: 4px; display: inline-block; } $("#audio-control").click(function () { if ($("#myVideo").prop("muted")) { $("#myVideo").prop("muted", false); $(this).text("Mute"); // or toggle class, style it with a volume icon sprite, change background-position } else { $("#myVideo").prop("muted", true); $(this).text("Unmute"); } }); 我想要 3tui 出保平安
